member_organisations:
The list of ICAS members is available at:

fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Consumers, Culture, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives:
I follow media policy, issues around new technologies and the information society, legislation around data protection, competition issues in the advertising sector, etc. 
 
Among the EU legislative initiatives of interest are: 
- GDPR 
- ePrivacy 
- AVMSD
membership: member of the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC) Belgium
goals__remit: I work as a freelance consultant for the international Council for Advertising Self-Regulation (ICAS), a global platform promoting responsible ads through the effective implementation of self-regulatory standards.
relevant_communication: The main ICAS publications can be found at: https://icas.global/resources/publications/
